descriptionHTML:
Have your chords ready! Anytime, anywhere!

Brand-new for Android Wear and exclusively for your smartwatch: Guitar Chords Wear

Guitar Chords Wear gives you easy access to over 400 guitar chords and 1460 variations - on the wrist!

Beginner? Or rather guitar enthousiast? All chords are being displayed in an easy and comprehensive standardised tablature notation.

• Numerous chords: Switching between chords has never been that easy. To see additional variations simply swipe over the text box.

• Individually adjustable: Don’t like any red? No problem! Choose your favourite colour yourself.

• Left- or right-handed: All chords are being displayed to your liking. The app is ambidextrous.

• Smartphone-independent: The app operates even if you do not have your smartphone at hand. Internet or Bluetooth connection is not necessary.

You need to be in possession of a smartwatch, compatible to Android Wear to use this app.!
On your smartphone itself you only find instructions for your smartwatch app!
Compatible devices at present:
• LG G Watch
• Samsung Gear Live
• Moto 360
• LG G Watch R
• Sony SmartWatch 3
• Asus Zenwatch
comments: Good app, one flaw on Moto 360 I was hoping for an app like this on my watch. Very convenient. The only problem is that the button at the bottom of the screen is cut off on the Moto 360 due to the "flat tire." Still usable, and still cool. If you need a simple chord ref for your phone, then this is a good choice.
Really handy app for an intermediate guitar player!
